title: Decoupling Customer location data
description:
Description
Business Outcome:
1. Faster loading and increased stability of the Flamingo application when managing customer location data.
2. Improved user experience with the ability to see, edit, and add locations under the assets tab more efficiently.
3. Enhanced search functionality for locations.
4. Streamlined location table with reduced columns and improved organization.
In Scope for Q1/2025:
1. Decoupling the customer location table.
2. Implementing a MicroService FrontEnd for the customer location data table.
Out of Scope for Q1/2025:
Availability check (to be addressed in Q2/2025).
